response.overview: Alex, a devoted member of an armored combat organization, measures his worth in violent spectacle. When a brutal duel shatters his ego, he spirals into the group’s traditionalist dogma, a fusion of medieval LARP and far-right grievance. After a street confrontation escalates from mockery to physical rage, Alex’s performative chivalry collapses into raw aggression.
response.tagline: After a knight-LARP enthusiast’s humiliating duel defeat, his violent unraveling exposes the dangerous allure of extremist masculinity.
response.title: NIFLHEIM
